title: 2 Rooms Apartment
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


My 60 m² superb Apartment located in Rue des Rosiers, one of the most famous street in Le Marais. With a 3 m 40 ceiling height, sandstone wall and exposed beams; it is newly renovated and stylishly furnished for you to have a comfortable stay in Paris.

2 Room Apartment
Rue des Rosiers, Paris, Île-de-France
Dog and cat friendly

2 Rooms
AC available
Heating available
Parking available
